physical_examinations.changes_over_time: O2 saturation improved to 100% after treatment.

vital_signs.blood_pressure: Kahwaji reports varied between 90/60 and 110/50 mmHg
vital_signs.pulse: Not available, average range during monitoring is noted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe bronchospasm with difficulty in ventilation after rapacuronium administration.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The bronchospasm resolved with treatment (albuterol, increasing anesthesia).

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe bronchospasm noted with difficulty in positive pressure ventilation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: SpO2 increased from 85% to around 96% after treatment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Complete atelectasis of the left lung with significant desaturation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Reexpansion of the left lung achieved successfully post-procedure.
